&reftitle.constants; &pdo.driver-constants;
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_NUM_RETRIES (integer)
How many times to try to retry if connection fails.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_RETRY_INTERVAL (integer)
Sets how long to wait until retrying a host if it was marked down.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES (integer)
Sets how many times to keep retrying a host before marking it as down.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_RANDOMIZE (boolean)
Randomize which host connect to. This option can be used if the DSN contains multiple host and port combinations.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_ALWAYS_TRY_LAST (boolean)
Always try to connect to the last host in the list.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_LINGER (integer)
How long does the socket linger after it's being closed. Value 0 turns off linger.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_NO_DELAY (boolean)
Whether to enable/disable Nagle algorithm.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_CONN_TIMEOUT (integer)
The connection timeout value. This driver will try to connect if the connection has been lost so this value can be set to control the timeout after object construction.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_RECV_TIMEOUT (integer)
Receive timeout.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_SEND_TIMEOUT (integer)
Send timeout.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_COMPRESSION (boolean)
Whether to enable compression.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_THRIFT_DEBUG (boolean)
Turns on thrift debugging. This converts thrift messages into PHP warnings. This option can be passed into the PDO constructor in the fourth argument.
PDO::CASSANDRA_ATTR_PRESERVE_VALUES (boolean)
Preserves values as they come from Cassandra
